content: Any thoughts on how to get all v2 segments (specifically PID, PV1, NK1, SPM) incorporated into the V2-to-FHIR mapping table (see Mappings tab): https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/cancer-reporting/StructureDefinition-us-pathology-bundle-mappings.html?

Have you looked at the V2-FHIR project space - quite a bit of that has been
mapped I think - but if not, then we will need to get on their calendar and
move that forward.
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/OO/2-To-FHIR+Project

Riki
Riki Merrick
Vernetzt, LLC
rikimerrick@gmail.com
cell: 916.216.0052
skype: riki.merrick

*What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of
difference you want to make. - Jane Goodall*

We've looked at v2-to-fhir IG- looks like it was last generated 6 months ago though, so maybe there's a more recent build somewhere with more recent info: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/v2-to-fhir/index.html

I think the issue is rooted in the V2 to FHIR Mapping tables from a given profile page. I think the table is generated by the IG Publisher during an IG's build; it's the V2 . Not sure where/how the Publisher builds the table though.
image.png

I have no idea where that table comes from - I think it is something you
would have to fill out in one of the files you load - the newest mappings
are kept in the googlesheets - I don't know when Hans and Craig get around
to updating the build - I know their goal is the May 2022 ballot, so by 3/6
then...

Riki
Riki Merrick
Vernetzt, LLC
rikimerrick@gmail.com
cell: 916.216.0052
skype: riki.merrick

*What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of
difference you want to make. - Jane Goodall*
The table comes from the underlying resource.
From the underlying resource in each IG, not the generic V2-FHIR mapping IG though, correct? Meaning someone on the IG team needs to create the content...
The mappings defined from the base resource are inherited by the IG. The IG can update the mappings but not remove them (though there's a tracker item to allow IGs to remove too).
The Google sheet at https://confluence.hl7.org/display/OO/2-To-FHIR+Project is definitely the latest and greatest map.
